page.title: 02UP HATHERLEY FARM,CHELTENHAM
page.content: Up Hatherley Farm is nearly surrounded by houses,fields and a lane called Greatfield Lane. In this farm there are three ponds but soon the ponds will be dried up.The tadpoles will die but people have fished some tadpoles out of the ponds to save them.The tadpoles are in one of the ponds,in the other two ponds there are newts and there are a few great-crested newts.The newts will not die because they will burrow into the ground or travel to a nearby pond. the calves have been born and they seem to be very hungry.The farmer keeps a lot of hens,chickens and the 115 eggs that they lay he sells.The farmer won't let us go into the farm when the cows are outside.In a few years time it won't be a farm,it will be houses.
